name: The Call of the Unicore
description:
Take care of the big little Unicore by making sure it's kept well fed, healthy and entertained, and do so while making sure none of those weird looking entities get to it!

Use WASD keys to move around. Use mouse to aim and Left Click to shoot.

Stay close to the Unicore and use Right Click to feed him, heal him or play with him. Use Scroll Wheel to switch between the different items that you have collected.

For a cooler experience, go full-screen!

Entry for the Ludum Dare #46. Compo solo entry (done in 48 hours).

Edit: I re-uploaded the MacOS version to fix permission flags of the application.
